title: Nicola Sturgeon: No second Scottish independence referendum until 'strong evidence' of change in attitude
text: A second referendum on Scottish independence will not be held until there is " strong and consistent evidence " of a change in attitude among voters, the SNP leadership has said. As the SNPâ€™s biggest ever party conference kicked off in
